fields.name: Ardent Censer
fields.description: +40 Ability Power +10% Cooldown Reduction +100% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive: +8% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Your heals and shields on another allied champion grant them 15% Attack Speed and 30 magic damage on-hit for 6 seconds. (This does not include regeneration effects or effects on yourself.)
